topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c061546368725888c60300#post_54c061546368725888c60300


There's a limit to how much hentai-esque fan service I can take.

I will grant them, however, that the using of giant boobs to stabilize a gun...was kinda funny and clever.


Hm....Princess Estia estia.

!http://media.giphy.com/media/gi1Ufkn0B1gfm/giphy.gif!

!http://38.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m6i8gcyLgb1qcwoano2_500.gif!

My word...I can see....Everything.. All of the me's.

...Why am I a irresponsible douche in so many? And who the hay are the red and black guys that keep showing up?
